title: NFS Rivals Resolution fix.rar
description:
This is a fix for the low fps and the resolution locked problem plaguing NFS:Rivals.. 

This Download will give you "800x600" and "640x480" resolution settings instead of 

the 1024x748 that is locked under pc settings. 

Simple to install 

1:download game settings. rare file

2:just add this game setting file to your NFS:Rivals save folder in your 
documents folder..
                     -----!!!!HERE!!!!-----
"C:UsersYour User Name HereDocumentsGhost GamesNeed for Speed(TM)Rivalssettings"

3:Play the Game and Enjoy

P.S if you already have a "High-End PC" and don't need lower resolution then this d/l is not for you, this is for the mid to low lvl users that are having problems with lag and not being able to load the game..any questions or problems leave comment
